
<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Type                    | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------- | ----------- |
| `chevron`   | `chevron`    | Show chevron on right side of the event list item                                                                                                                                                            | `boolean`               | `false`     |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Disable event list item                                                                                                                                                                                      | `boolean`               | `false`     |
| `itemColor` | `item-color` | Color of the status indicator. You can find a list of all available colors in our documentation. Example values are `--theme-color-alarm` or `color-alarm`  {@link https://ix.siemens.io/docs/styles/colors} | `string \| undefined`   | `undefined` |
| `selected`  | `selected`   | Show event list item as selected                                                                                                                                                                             | `boolean`               | `false`     |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | Variant of the event list item                                                                                                                                                                               | `"filled" \| "outline"` | `'outline'` |


## Events

| Event       | Description           | Type               |
| ----------- | --------------------- | ------------------ |
| `itemClick` | Event list item click | `CustomEvent<any>` |
